cboCostEstimates.description: As passed by the House of Representatives on October 20, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4032, Open RAN Outreach Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 108 (Tuesday, June 22, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ALLRED:
H.R. 4032.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Under Article I, Section 8, Clause 3: [The Congress shall
have Power] To regulate Commerce with foreign Nations, and
among the several States, and with the Indian Tribes
[Page H3006]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

title: Open RAN Outreach Act
